page.title: 03The School
page.content: {Education}in{Blackmore}is provided by the{Primary school}which takes pupils from the age of 5 to 11 .It was opened in 1970 and since then has had extensions and a{swimming pool}built .A{board school}was opened in Blackmore in 1877 with one classroom and a curtained off area for infants .This building was used until the present school was built .The{present {school}has 205 pupils,seven full time {teachers}and a{headmaster},one part time teacher and a{swimming instructress .Two people working in the {office},{a caretaker}, four {kitchen staff}and four midday assistants .The facilities of the school are often used by the village. At the age of eleven the pupils transfer to{secondary schools}in Brentwood,Ongar,Shenfield and Chelmsford
